ops.action: Use .jsx file extensions and plain JavaScript React patterns, not TypeScript. The project uses App.jsx as the main entry point.
ops.title: Frontend uses JSX with React (not TypeScript)
ops.trigger: When working on frontend components in frontend/src/

ops.action: Include `set -euo pipefail` at the top and use explicit error handling. Follow the pattern established in pipeline/04_generate_tiles.sh.
ops.title: Pipeline shell scripts use bash with set -euo pipefail
ops.trigger: When creating or editing shell scripts in the pipeline/ directory
